src:
Icardi Akan Lakukan Segalanya Agar Tak Kembali ke Inter Milan
05 Nov 2019, 08:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mauro Icardi nampaknya sudah nyaman menjalani kehidupan barunya bersama PSG. Ia bahkan siap untuk melakukan segalanya agar tak perlu kembali ke klub lamanya, Inter Milan.
Penyerang berkebangsaan Argentina itu berlabuh di Parc des Princes pada bursa transfer musim panas lalu. Ia diboyong dari Inter Milan dengan status pinjaman.
Dari delapan penampilannya di semua kompetisi, Icardi sudah menciptakan tujuh gol dan satu assist. Performanya sejauh ini terbilang apik, apalagi jika mengingat bahwa dirinya sempat tak pernah beraksi di lapangan selama beberapa bulan.
Ya, Icardi pernah memiliki masalah dengan Inter Milan sampai dirinya ditepikan cukup lama. Hal itu juga yang membuatnya ditendang dari San Siro meski telah memberikan kontribusi yang besar terhadap Nerazzurri.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Icardi Will Do Everything In Order Not To Return To Inter Milan
05 Nov 2019, 08:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mauro Icardi seems to have been comfortable living his new life with PSG. He is even ready to do everything so that he does not need to return to his old club, Inter Milan.
Argentine striker was anchored at the Parc des Princes in the transfer market last summer. He was brought off from Inter Milan on loan.
Of his eight appearances in all competitions, Icardi has created seven goals and one assist. His performance so far is fairly slick, especially when considering that he had never acted in the field for several months.
Yes, Icardi had a problem with Inter Milan until he was pushed aside long enough. It also made him kicked off from the San Siro despite having made a major contribution to the Nerazzurri.

Scroll down to read full information.
